channel.title: 2021 on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on OONI: Open Observatory of Network Interference

item.title: Year in Review: OONI in 2021
item.description: In light of the ongoing global COVID-19 pandemic, 2021 continued to be a challenging year for everyone. Yet, several exciting things happened in the censorship measurement world. In this post, we share some OONI highlights from 2021, as well as some upcoming OONI projects for 2022! OONI Probe Automated OONI Probe testing New Debian package for OONI Probe New OONI Probe Command Line Interface for Linux and macOS New OONI Probe Experimental card
